meanings.sent1: The premolded toy car was ready to play with right out of the box.
meanings.sent2: The premolded plastic parts easily snapped together to create a model airplane.
meanings.sent3: The premolded cookie dough made baking cookies a breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her premolded ideas about the project limited her creativity.
meanings.sent5: The premolded clay figure looked so lifelike.

meanings.sent1: The premolded concrete blocks were stacked to build the wall quickly.
meanings.sent2: The premolded chocolate pieces were used to decorate the cake.
meanings.sent3: The premolded ice cubes made the drink extra cold.
meanings.sent4: His premolded opinions left no room for discussion.
meanings.sent5: The premolded jigsaw puzzle pieces fit perfectly together.
